name: weatherstation-web-template
description: Template for the web part of the weather station. Based on NodeJS and TypeScript.
author: Andreas Ahlenstorf

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run transpile && npm run create_views && npm run create_public && npm run copy_views && npm run copy_public
scripts.clean: [ -d ./dist ] && echo 'web/dist exists' && npm run delete_dist || echo 'ERROR: web/dist does not exist'
scripts.delete_dist: rm -r ./dist && echo 'successfully deleted ./web/dist' && cd ../sensors && rm -r ./dist && echo 'successfully deleted ./sensors/dist'
scripts.transpile: tsc && echo 'successfully transpiled web' && cd ../sensors && tsc && echo 'successfully transpiled sensors'
